Title: Djävulens advokat
Writer: Johan Bogaeus, Maj Sjöwall, Per Wahlöö
Actors: Peter Haber, Kristofer Hivju, Ingvar Hirdwall
Plot: A Dane enters a restaurant and argues with the owner. He shoots the owner. No one "saw" the killer. The police team, now led by Alex, investigates. The Dane finds it useful that his lawyer is Alex' brother.
